attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bored of the Government trying to hold your hand? Watch over your shoulder? Drown you in soppy legislation so that they, the big, nice Government can tell us what to do because, silly people that we are we are obviously totally incapable of running our own lives. Then sign this petition for them to let us run our lives how we want.

rejection.details: Your petition fails to give a specific action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
